page.title: 16Schools Library Service
page.content: Miss Knowles runs all the schools' libraries in the area. The books are supplied by the Library supply company. The Schools Library Service loans items to primary,secondary and special schools in the area. They supply project material,picture slides,film strips,wall charts, cassettes,videos,computer discs and kits. They moved into their present building 18 months ago and are now very busy. The most popular books are story books like Fox Busters,Super Gran and Charlie and the Chocolate Factory. They have 171,200 books and 4739 other resources. Miss Knowles' main job is to run the Schools Library Service but she also runs the Public Library Service. If the books get damaged the staff use butterfly tape to repair them.
